nodes.text: A tomb was built by the Sith Lord Darth Perash of the Sith Empire. The tomb's construction lasted decades, as Perash continually ordered the workers to tear their progress down and start again. In around the year 3643 BBY, while the construction was still in progress, scavengers searched through the latest rubble and salvaged various construction materials and items overlooked by Perash.
The tomb was first mentioned as part of the scavenging crew skills mission "Perfectionist" in the 2011 BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic. The mission did not make clear the tomb's location.
